英语词汇的奥秘 ... eaglet 小鹰 crotchet 小钩 glacieret 小冰川.
世纪的助产士Percivall Willughby(1596-1685)在Observations in Midwifery一书中,就公开呼吁产婆们勿使用代用器械处理产妇腹中死胎;而指导她们如何使用产钩(crotchet).

乃因在D 域(D-region)内,对高频(2至3mc) 无线电波之吸收突然显著增加,而使此一频率范围内之接收信号消失;(b) 地磁突变(magnetic crotchet), 系由于游离层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'hook'): from Old French crochet, diminutive of croc 'hook', from Old Norse krókr

entry.def: A crotchet is a musical note that has a time value equal to two quavers.

means.word_mean: 1. a sharp curve or crook; a shape resembling a hook
2. a musical note having the time value of a quarter of a whole note
4. a small tool or hook-like implement
